name: Blast Apart
description:
A one-v-one vs game made with my twin brother for Mech Jam. We were brought back to notebook comics we'd make during classes.

Play as two robots as they blast each other apart, charge up each of your arms or your jump thrusters. Try to dodge incoming attacks with your eight-way dash. Be careful to avoid getting hit in the head.

If you're alone, select "survival" to play against the kaiju, Eyezor.

Works with keyboard or plugged in controllers.

Edit: Changed jumping to charge and overheat like the arms.
